name: Galapagoats
description:
GalapaGoats, 2 Goats 1 Rope, is a local multiplayer arcade game where a bunch of goats battle their way to the top of Galapagos mountain! Who eats more grass (and make more poop) wins the game! Using our innovative control system, up to 8 players in local can enjoy the game! The cost is friendship though. 

Compatible with gamepads.

[WASD] to Move, [E] to charge, [Space] to Jump, [Hold Ctrl] to use the SuperFart

Even if you can try the game with only one player, 2-8 players are strongly suggested.

The game was originally created in 2015 with XNA for a small competition in italy. We decided to convert the game to Monogame and .NetCore in June 2021 for future-proofing of this great gem.
